AI Description: R-munsell is a package that provides easy access to Munsell colours in R. The Munsell system is a widely used color classification system that categorizes colors based on three color dimensions: hue, value, and chroma.
Core Features: Access Munsell Color Notations, Convert Munsell Colors To Other Color Spaces, Visualize Munsell Colors
General Tags: Color Classification, Color Notations, Color Spaces, Data Visualization
